Mediante resolución 272.CP.2018 el Conse: Through resolution 272.CP.2018 the Polytechnic Council in ordinary session held on Tuesday, May 22, 2018 resolves
Aprobar la creación de la EMPRESA PÚBLIC: Approve the creation of the ESPOCH PUBLIC COMPANY (ESPOCH EP)
Brindar alternativas innovadoras de solu: Provide innovative alternative solutions to the various needs of the country, through the offer of advisory services, consultancy, execution or administration of investment projects, production, research, training and others; subject to the Organic Law of Public Companies, with maximum quality so that they contribute to economic, human, scientific-technological and sustainable development.
Ser la empresa pública líder a nivel nac: To be the leading public company at the national level and to be projected at the international level in the provision of quality innovative services and projects that contribute, in a sustained manner, to economic, human, scientific-technological and sustainable development.
